metadata.title: CVE-2020-15275 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MoinMoin is a wiki engine. In MoinMoin before version 1.9.11, an attackerwith write permissions can upload an SVG file that contains maliciousjavascript. This javascript will be executed in a user's browser when theuser is viewing that SVG file on the wiki. Users are strongly advised toupgrade to a patched version. MoinMoin Wiki 1.9.11 has the necessary fixesand also contains other important fixes.

criterions.comment: moin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
